item.title: I-10 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 11 - TX-20/Mesa St. Next exits are - US-85/Sunland Park Drive/Paisano Drive and Executive Center Blvd.

item.title: TX-20 West at FM-1905
item.description: TX-20 west at FM-1905 junction in Anthony, TX.

item.title: TX-20 West at FM-1905
item.description: TX-20 west at FM-1905 junction. FM-1905 joins TX-20 west for a few blocks through Anthony. Use FM-1905 east for I-10.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 78
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 78 - TX-20/McNary. TX-20 runs between the Rio Grande and I-10 between here and El Paso. Views of the Rio Grande and Mexico can be seen south of the highway through through this area.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 11
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 11 - TX-20/Mesa St. Approaching Redd Road, TX-178/Artcraft Road/Paseo del Norte interchanges.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 12 and 11
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 12 - Resler Drive. Approaching Exit 11 - TX-20/Mesa St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 13 - Sunland Park Drive. Approaching Resler Drive, and TX-20/Mesa St. interchanges.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 19B and 19A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 19B - Downtown/Convention Center/Tourist Information/Arts District. Approaching Exit 19A - TX-20/Mesa St. Use left 3 lanes for I-10 west.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 19B
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 19B - Downtown/Convention Center/Tourist Information/Arts District. Use Exit 19B for Juarez, Mexico. Approaching TX-20/Mesa St., Porfirio Diaz St., and Schuster Ave.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 20
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 20 - Cotton St. Approaching Downtown, TX-20/Mesa St., and Porfirio Diaz St. interchanges.

item.title: TX-375 Loop - Exits 47 and 48
item.description: TX-375 Loop southwest at Exit 47 - TX-20/FM-258/Alameda Ave./Socorro Road/Pan American Drive. Approaching Exit 48 - Juarez, Mexico/Zaragoza International Bridge/Zaragoza Road.

item.title: TX-375 Loop South - Exit 47
item.description: TX-375 Loop South approaching Exit 47 - TX-20/FM-258/Alameda Ave./Socorro Road/Pan American Drive.

item.title: TX-375 Loop South - Exit 45
item.description: TX-375 Loop South at Exit 45 - FM-76/North Loop Road. Approaching TX-20/Alameda Ave. and FM-258/Soccoro Road/Pan American Drive.
